subject: Re: Payment failure: G Suite Basic for thepcg.com.au
preview: Hi Tim, We are going great over here, hope you are well also!Confirming this is now updated.

full_threads.body:
Hi Tim,

We are going great over here, hope you are well also!

Confirming this is now updated.

Hi Heath

Hope all is well. Could you please take off our landing page the logo that runs across the page of the APS please (I couldn't figure out how to do it)? thanks!

On 26 July 2018 at 11:36, Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Tim,

Thanks for looking into that. Are you able to add in your CC details of a valid card?

I will then make sure we aren’t charging you as well.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>
> On 20 Jul 2018, at 6:32 pm, Tim Smith <tim.smith@thepcg.com.au <mailto:tim.smith@thepcg.com.au>> wrote:
>
> Hi Heath
>
> Not sure exactly what this is for? I logged on and the credit care details expired and the number which was a visa ended in 6438 which I don’ think is any of mine…
>
> From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>]
> Sent: Friday, July 20, 2018 3:08 PM
> To: The PCG <tim.smith@thepcg.com.au <mailto:tim.smith@thepcg.com.au>>
> Subject: Re: Payment failure: G Suite Basic for thepcg.com.au <http://thepcg.com.au/>
>
> Hi Tim,
>
> Looks like an expired credit card?
>
> Are you able to login and see which card they are using by clicking on the link in the original email?
>
> Thanks,
> HEATH MAGUIRE
> CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
> E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
>
> <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
>
>> On 18 Jul 2018, at 9:56 am, Tim Smith <tim.smith@thepcg.com.au <mailto:tim.smith@thepcg.com.au>> wrote:
>>
>> HI Heath
>>
>> Hope all is going well with you – this came through again and not really sure what it’s about? Thanks
>>
>> From: gsuite-noreply@google.com <mailto:gsuite-noreply@google.com> [mailto:gsuite-noreply@google.com <mailto:gsuite-noreply@google.com>]
>> Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2018 5:49 PM
>> To: tim.smith@thepcg.com.au <mailto:tim.smith@thepcg.com.au>
>> Subject: Payment failure: G Suite Basic for thepcg.com.au <http://thepcg.com.au/>
>>
>>
>> Payment failure: G Suite Basic for thepcg.com.au <http://thepcg.com.au/>
>> Hello
>> The last payment for your G Suite Basic subscription for thepcg.com.au <http://thepcg.com.au/> failed. This indicates that there's something wrong with your payment method.
>> To prevent the suspension of all services for all users on August 1, 2018:
>> Contact your bank or credit card company to resolve the issue with your payment method.
>> Go to your Admin console to retry or update your payment method and pay your outstanding balance. If you couldn't resolve the issue, you'll need to add a new payment method instead.
>> See complete instructions for fixing a payment failure <https://support.google.com/a/answer/2523116?utm_source=1208666&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GG>.
>> Go to Admin console <https://accounts.google.com/signin/v2/identifier?service=CPanel&continue=https://admin.google.com/Dashboard?utm_source=1208666&flowName=GlifWebSignIn&flowEntry=Identifier&Email=tim.smith@thepcg.com.au&hl=en>
>> Sincerely,
>> The G Suite Team

>>

Tim Smith
Principal Psychologist
BA (Psych), PGDip (Psych), PGDip (SocHlth), MMH (NSW Inst Psychiatry), MAPS

ph: 1800 151 208 | fax: 02 9475 5180 | www.thepcg.com.au <http://www.thepcg.com.au/>
